page.title: 17Attitudes (Ardleigh Green)
page.content: A thriving and growing community.The neighbourhood is a pleasant and a very friendly one.Though we have many playing fields there is little to do.We have plenty of ordinary shops as well as a carpet sale room.These are some of our amenities pubs,churches,new industries,clubs, ,telephone boxes,shops ,bus stops,Euro exhauts,a doctors, zebra crossing,petrol station,and a mini roundabout.We have very good schools such as The Royal Liberty,Ardleigh Green Junior(and Infant)and Hare Park.Our clubs aren't bad either.Boys enjoy cubs,football,scouts,judo and karate.Girls have brownies,guides,judo and dancing.Our local college represents Havering as a borough college.It has very high standards.Finally we have our school with its motto "Strive to Suceed".
